data.text: @OntHospitalAssn Covid related… is that icu with Covid or in the ICU because of Covid？
@karsatov @OntHospitalAssn @AnthonyDaleOHA Probably not, Covid is just too contagious now. At 1 of 5 icus cases are people in the hospital for other reasons.

@karsatov @OntHospitalAssn @AnthonyDaleOHA Summer 2020 with 20 in ICU is  impossible due to incidental transmissions/those not in ICU due to COVID. In Aug 2020 we did not count those still in ICU but recovered. If we counted the same now we would be at 200 in ICU. 20% are incidental so if we count the same we have 160 now
@OntHospitalAssn How about over laying the deaths on this chart?  Where is @Billius27 (our stats extraordinaire).  We miss him & his lovely info.
@OntHospitalAssn @AnthonyDaleOHA We’re never going to work to get it down to the levels of summer 2020.
